description: This file defines React context and hooks for managing notes state and actions in a React application, including CRUD operations interfacing with notesService.

methods.name: reducer
methods.description: Handles state updates based on dispatched actions for notes.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: Provides notes state and actions via React Context to child components.

methods.name: useNotesState
methods.description: Custom hook to access notes state context.

methods.name: useNotesActions
methods.description: Custom hook to access notes actions context.
